title: Define Project Scope and Requirements
description: Gather and document the project requirements, including the features and functionalities of the personal health assistant, data sources, and target users.

title: Design the system architecture for AsistenteSaludIa
description: Design the general architecture of the system, including components, data flow, and integration points. Consider aspects such as scalability, maintainability, modularity, error handling, and performance optimization. Ensure compatibility with real-time health metrics and personalized advice.
dependencies: Define the scope and requirements of the project

title: Design User Interface - Updated
description: Design the user interface for the personal health assistant. The design should include a responsive layout, intuitive navigation, prioritizing user experience, accessibility considerations, and adherence to our established Design System. Please focus on creating an engaging yet informative platform that caters to various user preferences and abilities.

title: Design Data Storage and Management
description: Design the data storage and management system for the AsistenteSaludIa project. This includes creating the database schema, implementing data ingestion pipelines, defining data processing pipelines, outlining data security and privacy measures, planning data backup and recovery strategies, and considering potential scalability issues.

title: Design Health Recommendation Engine (Revised)
description: Design the health recommendation engine, focusing on creating efficient and effective algorithms for personalized health advice. The design should incorporate multiple data sources, robust personalization mechanisms, and seamless integration with other system components. Additionally, consider the scalability and maintainability of the solution.

title: Design Security and Privacy Measures for Handling Sensitive Health Data and Ensuring User Privacy
description: Design the security and privacy measures including data encryption, anonymization techniques, secure user authentication, and compliance with relevant regulations such as HIPAA, for handling sensitive health data and ensuring user privacy. The design should also address potential vulnerabilities in the system architecture.

title: Define Testing Strategy
description: Define the testing strategy, including unit tests, integration tests, and end-to-end tests, to ensure the quality and reliability of the system.

title: Plan Deployment and DevOps
description: Plan the deployment and DevOps strategy, including the infrastructure, continuous integration and delivery, and monitoring and logging.

title: Develop Documentation and User Guides
description: Develop comprehensive documentation and user guides for the personal health assistant, including installation, configuration, and usage instructions.
